text: 2. Were you familiar with the above information? ‫ؠ‬ Yes, completely ‫ؠ‬ Yes, mostly ‫ؠ‬ Yes, some of it ‫ؠ‬ Yes, vaguely ‫ؠ‬ No, not at all 3. No one knows exactly how many people would get sick if an influenza pandemic were to occur. Please estimate how many people in the Netherlands you think would get sick if an influenza pandemic were to occur.
